---
title: "Sample Graphs & Tables"
output: html_document
---



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(xtable)
library(readr)

library(readr)
meta_data_citations <- read_csv('meta_data_citations.csv')

fig1 =ggplot(meta_data_citations, aes(x=journal, y = citations))+
  geom_line()+
  theme_bw(base_size = 4)+
  theme(text=element_text(family="Times New Roman"))

ggsave("Figures/test1.png", plot = fig1, width = .7, height = .7,dpi = 320)



tbl1 = xtable(summary(meta_data_citations))
print(xtable(tbl1, type = "latex", caption = "Xtable Example"), file = "Figures/table1.tex", caption.placement = "top")

```
